metadata.title: CVE-2017-11421 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: gnome-exe-thumbnailer before 0.9.5 is prone to a VBScript Injection whengenerating thumbnails for MSI files, aka the "Bad Taste" issue. There is alocal attack if the victim uses the GNOME Files file manager, and navigatesto a directory containing a .msi file with VBScript code in its filename.

criterions.comment: gnome-exe-thumbnailer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
